attributes.action: BAN ABORTION - UNLESS THREAT TO MOTHER`S LIFE  IE ECTOPIC
attributes.additional_details:
Killing is murder and in the year 2011 people should be aware of this and not assume it is OK.
Abortion is killing a innocent child.
This must be stopped unless to protect the mother`s life I.E in an ectopic pregnancy.
Killing someone and even your own baby in your stomach carries all the psychological characters of a murderer- pure hate and contempt, not to mention the after-effects of murder - regret and self pity.
The london riots has demonstrated the levels that the society has degraded due to mothers producing children and these children having to be brought up by murder accepting mothers.
We the public should seek to saving life not killing. -even the shariah which is held in contempt by many -is the solution as within its political justice system the rights of the unborn child are protected by the LAW, and this is measured as a child with the RIGHT TO LIVE.
